name: Meatloaf Caprese Sandwich
description: Prep the meatloaf ahead of time to get this recipe ready in 10 min! Microwave or bake, chill, then slice.

ingredients.name: medium-sized panini buns or chopped baguette

preparation: In 4-Cup Prep Bowl, stir sauce mix with water and let stand 5 min. Meanwhile, cut each slice of cheese in half. To bowl, add olive oil. Whisk vigorously. Add cheese; gently toss to coat.
Slice buns open. Toast, if desired.
Fill each bun with meatloaf and cheese. Drizzle with any remaining pesto sauce.
tips: Bocconcini are small mozzarella cheese balls. They come in different sizes and are delicious in salads. For this recipe, look for pre-sliced bocconcini (sometimes called medallion slices).
For a warm sandwich, simply microwave prepared sandwich until warmed through. Alternatively, warm sliced meatloaf in a pan on the stovetop.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup fresh mixed veggiesâ€”try chopped tomatoes and bell peppers.

products.name: Honey Mustard
summary: A bold twist on a classic condiment made with 100% Canadian mustard seed and organic honey.

products.name: Classic Meatloaf Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: Traditional home-style meatloaf. Deeply rich beef flavour, dressed up with a tangy, sweet sauce.
